summary: Give the following information for key profesional personnel listed on page 2. beginning with thePrincipat Investigator/Program Director. Photocopy this page for each person, except for the Adjunct Professor, who has already published a book on the subject. Use the weekly Newsquiz to test your knowledge of stories you saw on this site.
